alert.note: Alert for Coleman; Crockett; Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 31 at 8:43AM CDT until March 31 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Crockett, Schleicher and Coleman Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 5 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds may cause dangerous driving conditions for high profile vehicles, due to cross winds on roadways that run mainly north and south. This will include Highways 84 and Highway 277.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
